tachyon.master.lineage.meta

Class LineageStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.lineage.meta.LineageStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable

    public final class LineageStore
extends Object
implements JournalCheckpointStreamable
    A store of lineages. This class is thread-safe. TODO(yupeng): relax locking

        public boolean hasOutputFile(long fileId)
        Checks if there's an output file with given file id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
